entry.title: For the years to keep on spinning
entry.summary:
Author: ionia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,973Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 62

Summary: After almost ten years of marriage, Bruce and Clarkâ€™s relationship is strained and they're not in sync anymore. Now, with their anniversary coming up, can they bridge the gap? The rest of their combined family takes matters in their own hands and organize a getaway for the two. Unfortunately, the only way to make the world's finest take a vacation is to parent trap them into a fake dating and fake mission trip halfway across the world.Unfortunately, Clark finds out about this scheme and now he must navigate the trip with a prickly bathusband, all while trying to salvage their marriage.Â FYI: Work is finished and will be updated twice a week!

entry.title: When Alfredâ€™s Away, Bruce Will Play (Adopt)
entry.summary:
Author: Slowly_Falling_Away

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,927Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 297

Summary: As Alfred frowned at him disapprovingly, watching the nine children playing in the foyer, of which only two had been at the manor before the man had taken his three-month vacation, Bruce was ready to admit that he may have a bit of an adoption problem.With Alfred on vacation, Bruce speedruns adoption, and his family grows. Never mind the lack of sleep and increasing chaos, he totally has this. Featuring tired parent Bruce Wayne, smitten Clark Kent, late to the party Dick, good big brother Jason, chaos duo Tim and Steph, down for crime Kon, just chilling Cass, babies Damian and Jon, and confused Duke.

entry.title: Parenting Justice
entry.summary:
Author: Yuri_Osakawa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,409Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 75

Summary: In one world, Johnathan and Martha Kent found a baby in a spaceship.In this world, they found a baby alongside two adults.In this world, someone else became the Dark Knight of Gotham. A loving father that survived what wouldâ€™ve been a tragic accident in another world.In this world, someone else became the Wonder Woman. An immortal queen, and a mother.In this world, a father gained access to the Speed Force instead of his son.In this world, another test pilot found a dying alien and gained the Green Lantern ring.In this world, a queen rules the oceans.Because parenting justice is much tougher than delivering it.

entry.title: Built from Broken Things
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,171Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Bruce had always been alone, or he had Alfred. But he now found himself in a new role. Mentor of some sorts to the 8 year old boy. The first few weeks had Been rough. The boy was broken in so many ways and it became apparent to Bruce that he needed more than a mentor.This fic is a mix of father son relationship between Bruce and Dick from the beginning and how it changes over time. Including superbat and their coparenting moments and how they navigate first their own relationship which is not yet established and later being dads with angsty teens.Angsty teens who are in relationships and have sex (the talk). But also kids who deep down are pretty hurt by the world.

entry.title: Blasphemous Rumors
entry.summary:
Author: Fluffmonster69

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,720Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Inspired by the events of Batman: Gotham By Gaslight (1989) Bruce Wayne is on trial, believed to be Jack the Ripper after the serial murders follow him from London to Gotham. Clark Kent is sent to report on the trial and the week leading to Bruce's execution. He is unnerved by Bruce, who's appearance and demeanor have drastically changed, however upon arriving back in Gotham a day after the trial Clark is greeted with the city in uproar. Bruce Wayne has escaped his imprisonment and criminals start cropping up half dead covered in identical puncture wounds. Clark sets out to find Bruce as Superman, finding instead a monster lurking in the shadows of Gotham's streets.*Tags and warnings may change.Updates once a week :)
